snippet: The United States' first black, openly gay male judge was appointed to the federal bench on Tuesday in a unanimous confirmation decision by the U.S. Senate....

headline.print_headline: First Black, Openly Gay Man Confirmed as U.S. Federal Judge
headline.main: First Black, Openly Gay Man Confirmed as U.S. Federal Judge

lead_paragraph: The United States' first black, openly gay male judge was appointed to the federal bench on Tuesday in a unanimous confirmation decision by the U.S. Senate.
